message: One of our most insightful beta testers, Wilhem Pujar (http://twitter.com/#!/WilhemPujar), has a lot of thoughts around socializing LivePlay. He said "you can provide recommendations regarding the media currently consumed (audio, video, text) in non-queue mode and build a social document graph."           How would you like to see the site become more social?
What sort of features would you like us to build in our future releases of LivePlay?
